title: Input Data
description: A vertical side navigation widget for creating sidebar menus in dashboards. Use this widget to provide hierarchical or list-based navigation along the side of the dashboard. Features a clickable title/header and multiple navigation items with icons. Supports customizable styling for fonts and colors to match your dashboard theme. Ideal for applications with multiple sections, settings pages, or when you need persistent navigation that doesn't take up header space.

title.title: Title Settings
title.description: The header text displayed at the top of the side navigation, typically used for branding or section identification.

route.title: Title Navigation
route.description: The destination path when the title/header is clicked. Use for navigating to a home or main page. Use relative paths or enable leadingSlash for absolute routing.

leadingSlash.title: Add Leading Slash
leadingSlash.description: When enabled, prepends '/' to the title's navigation route making it absolute from the root. When disabled, routes are relative to the current location.

trailingSlash.title: Add Trailling Slash
trailingSlash.description: When enabled, appends '/' to the end of the title's navigation route. Required by some routing configurations.

style.title: Item Style
style.description: Global styling options applied to all navigation items in the sidebar.

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description: Font size in pixels for navigation item labels.

color.title: Font Color
color.description: Text color for navigation item labels and icons.

backgroundColor.title: Background Color
backgroundColor.description: Background color of the side navigation panel.

navItems.title: Navigation Items
navItems.description: Array of navigation links displayed vertically in the sidebar. Each item can have a label, icon, and destination route.

label.title: Label
label.description: The text displayed for this navigation item. Should clearly describe the destination section.

iconName.title: Icon Name
iconName.description: Material icon name displayed alongside the label. Find icon names at https://fonts.google.com/icons (e.g., 'dashboard', 'settings', 'analytics', 'people').

route.title: Navigation Route
route.description: The destination path when this item is clicked. Use relative paths that append to the current URL, or enable leadingSlash for absolute routing.

leadingSlash.title: Add Leading Slash
leadingSlash.description: When enabled, prepends '/' to this item's route making it absolute from the root.

trailingSlash.title: Add Trailling Slash
trailingSlash.description: When enabled, appends '/' to the end of this item's route.
